comments.body: Include instructions at the top of the file so users know what to do with this. You can use the other templates as starting point.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +12,16 @@# NOTE: Automatic provisioning of VMware credentials requires an ansible-core-ci API key.

[DEFAULT]
vcenter_username: @VMWARE_USERNAME
vcenter_password: @VMWARE_PASSWORD
